name: VShojo Fighters
description:
Fighting game based on the talented vTubers of VShojo.
Game made for VShojo Art Contest.

*Keyboard only
*Recommended to play on fullscreen (since the browser scrolls if you press the  down key)


PS: The game has only Kson to play.
My GPU died accidentally and I could not finish it as intended (for now). Remember to close the windows when leaving the house, it may rain😅.

I hope you enjoy it :)!
